OOC: Subtlety never was your strong suit was it ... oh wait ... nevermind 
that I forgot I'm not supposed to be sarcastic.  OOH but I could have fun 
with this.

::Aerotaur::
       His aimless wanderings through the Maximal base had proven fruitless.  
Literally.  There was a severe lack of fruit.  This might've been because he 
never found the mess hall but that thought hadn't occurred to him yet.  
Neither had the fact that he had been walking in circles through the crew 
quarters area for quite some time.  Well, on his umpteenth trip down one of 
the halls he happened upon the brooding Empath heading into her room.  She 
hadn't seen him of course although she should have sensed him.  Perhaps she 
was just too distracted he thought to himself.  Regardless he turned around 
and walked the other way searching for more fruit and maybe his friend too, 
but only if he wanted fruit.

--part1_1a1.d360eb4.2b2957a6_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
